name: id
type: Type: String (cast from an integer, but not guaranteed to be a number)
description: Description: The ID of the report in the database.

name: action_taken
description: Description: Whether an action was taken to resolve this report.

name: action_taken_at
type: Type: NULLABLE String (ISO 8601 Datetime) or null
description: Description: When an action was taken, if this report is currently resolved.

name: category
description: Description: The category under which the report is classified.

name: comment
description: Description: An optional reason for reporting.

name: forwarded
description: Description: Whether a report was forwarded to a remote instance.

name: created_at
description: Description: The time the report was filed.

name: updated_at
description: Description: The time of last action on this report.

name: account
description: Description: The account which filed the report.

name: assigned_account
description: Description: The account of the moderator assigned to this report.

name: action_taken_by_account
description: Description: The account of the moderator who handled the report.

name: statuses
description: Description: Statuses attached to the report, for context.

name: rules
description: Description: Rules attached to the report, for context.
